title: Suspected of corruption, Rio de Janeiro governor to have records scrutinized
description:
The Superior Court of Justice (STJ), Brazil’s second highest judicial body, authorized law enforcement to scrutinize Rio de Janeiro Governor Cláudio Castro’s communications, fiscal, and banking records as part of an investigation into alleged misappropriation of public funds in the state of Rio de Janeiro. On Wednesday, federal agents raided the home of Mr. Castro’s […]

The post Suspected of corruption, Rio de Janeiro governor to have records scrutinized appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Brazilian economic activity dropped slightly in October
description:
The Central Bank published on Wednesday its economic activity index for October, suggesting that the Brazilian economy shrunk by 0.06 percent when compared to the previous month. The IBC-Br index is considered a reliable bellwether of official gross domestic product data. While negative, October results beat expectations — analysts expected a drop of as much as […]

The post Brazilian economic activity dropped slightly in October appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Musk says X is not responsible for Brazil’s first lady account hijack
description:
X owner Elon Musk denied on Wednesday that his company has any responsibility for the hijack of Brazilian First Lady Rosângela da Silva’s account on the social media platform. “It is not clear how someone guessing her email password is our responsibility,” he said, reacting to the recent pledge by Mrs. Silva to sue the […]

The post Musk says X is not responsible for Brazil’s first lady account hijack appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
